channel.title: Examples on uDO
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on uDO

item.title: Basic Example
item.description: Basic Example # FPATH = '/tmp/test.touch' def TaskTouch(): return { 'description': 'Creates the file', 'outs': [FPATH], # This task creates these files 'actions': [ f'echo "Ahoy there!" > {FPATH}', ], } def TaskMessage(): return { 'description': 'Prints the file', 'deps': [FPATH], # This task depends on these files 'capture': 1, # Show stdout 'actions': [ f'cat {FPATH}', ], }
